body_html: @achernodub you error is unrelated, as you can see in the error message, the problem is that some of your elements are torch.LongTensor and should be torch.cuda.LongTensor. I guess you forgot to send some tensors to the GPU.
body_text: @achernodub you error is unrelated, as you can see in the error message, the problem is that some of your elements are torch.LongTensor and should be torch.cuda.LongTensor. I guess you forgot to send some tensors to the GPU.
body: @achernodub you error is unrelated, as you can see in the error message, the problem is that some of your elements are `torch.LongTensor` and should be `torch.cuda.LongTensor`. I guess you forgot to send some tensors to the GPU.
